title: The Adventure Zone: Amnesty - Episode 4
description: Our heroes learn the whole truth of Mama's endeavors while recovering from a strange evening, and begin planning their first hunt. Aubrey remembers a relic from her past. Duck gets a late night visit from Minerva. Ned gets stuck.
author: shows@themcelroy.family (The McElroys)
